page.title: 09EDUCATION IN DYCE
page.content: {NURSERY SCHOOL} Pupils start school here. There are 2 sessions a day lasting 2\ hours each. Children attend between the ages of 3-5. {PRIMARY SCHOOL} This is situated in the middle of Dyce and has 784 pupils beteen ages of 5-12. There are 35 teachers. The school uses new methods such as Spectrum computers. {SECONDARY SCHOOL} Dyce Academy has 980 pupils and 73 teachers. Pupils come from Newmachar and Fintray as well as Dyce. Computers are used here too and many other new methods. Pupils do a variety of subjects and can stay on until the age of 18. Adults also attend the school. A teachers strike has affected the school at times during the past year and will continue next year.
